data.title: Akriloth's Fire Blade
data.text:
Locations:

Akriloth Extreme Challenge

Dragon Champion - Mount Ashfall Camp

Price: N/A

Dropped by Akriloth Exposed (Extreme Challenge)

Craft the following:

Dragon Trophy x20 x10

20,000 Gold

Sellback: 10 Gold

Level: 20

Power: 440 450

Craft Time 5 Hours 5 Minutes

Speed Up: 100 Dragon Crystals

Description: A blade unlike any other, this large weapon generates its own heat and seems to have dragon-like parts somehow grown into it.
